interface.name: agent.ontology.interfaces.PopulatedArea
interface.description: A PopulatedArea is a region of the terrain that can contain populations. To act on a population, a Unit act ons the populated area containing it.

method.name: alertIt
method.description: To alert the populations contained in the populated area.

method.name: undoAlertIt
method.description: To revert the effect of "alert" on the populations contained in the populated area.

method.name: confineIt
method.description:
To confine the population located into the populated area.
This action can take time (depending on the current status of the population, e.g. if the population is alerted, the confinement is done more quickly).

return.name: confinement
return.description: True if the confinement is completed or if the populated area does not contain population to confine, false otherwise.

method.name: isConfined
method.description: Returns true if a population is confined into the populated area.

return.name: confinement
return.description: True if a population is confined into the populated area, false otherwise.

method.name: undoConfineIt
method.description: To lift the confinement of a population into the populated area.

return.name: undoConfinement
return.description: True if the confinement is lifted or if the populated area does not contain confined population, false otherwise.

method.name: evacuateIt
method.description:
To evacuate the population located into the populated area.
This action can take time (depending on the current status of the population, e.g. if the population is alerted, the evacuation is done more quickly).

return.name: evacuation
return.description: True if the evacuation is completed or if the populated area does not contain population to evacuate, false otherwise.

method.name: isEvacuated
method.description: Returns true if a population is evacuated from the populated area.

return.name: evacuation
return.description: True if a population is evacuated from the populated area, false otherwise.

method.name: undoEvacuateIt
method.description: To lift the confinement of a population into the populated area.

return.name: undoEvacuation
return.description: True if the confinement is lifted or if the populated area does not contain confined population, false otherwise.
